page.title: 01Introduction
page.content:
Our area is situated on the foothills of Dartmoor and is characterised by undulating landscape. This gives rise to spectacular views from almost any high point in the area. The land on the east side rises from the Teign Valley to over 1000 feet on the west.
There are 2 villages, Christow - about half a mile from the River Teign sprawling alongside the winding lanes - and Bridford - a smaller more compact community at about 800 feet. Most of the land is farmed by small family concerns and there are scattered farmhouses throughout the whole area. The population is about 1150.
